title: Looking for members to form a high Diamond Team D5+
body:
This team will be focused on competitive play and climbing the ladder.
We will have set times for practice and game reviewing
These are the positions yet to be filled adc,mid,top,jng
If you are interested please fill in the below and leave it in the comments 
IGN:
AGE:
Rank (Diamond 5+ only):
ROLE:
Top 4 Champs:
Play style:
What You Want Out Of a Team:
What you bring to a team:

My IGN Is Century

replies.body:
IGN: Colour shade
AGE: 17
Rank (Diamond 5+ only): Plat 1
ROLE: Support
Top 4 Champs: Leona Naut Zyra Nami
Play style: Agressive peel
What You Want Out Of a Team: a fun but serious enviroment to achieve a decent ranking
What you bring to a team: I feel like i'm a pretty good shot caller but am happy to take the back seat
